Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • Animal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bear, Beaver, Dolphin, Elephant, Lion, Snake

    public abstract class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing all animal types
    Author:
    Jason Ryan
